item.description:
It's almost time for some guerrilla style sumo-bot!

We're meeting at 11:30 on Saturday in front of JP Licks in Davis Square. Bring your sumo and your A game.

If you need to work on your bot, drop in tonight at the open hack at 440 Somerville ave (in the basement) and we'll get it finished up.

We're planning on starting the event right at noon, and I'll be sending out more info as it becomes available.

Thanks,
Meredith
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the sumo bot ring.
item.name: SumoBot Competition
